channel.title: siegfried on IT for archivists
channel.description: Recent content in siegfried on IT for archivists

item.title: siegfried
item.description: Siegfried Siegfried is a signature-based file format identification tool. It implements: the National Archives UK’s PRONOM file format signatures freedesktop.org’s MIME-info file format signatures the Library of Congress’s FDD file format signatures (beta). Install Windows download latest (v. 1.7.11) binary: (64bit | 32bit ) copy to a location in your system path run the sf -update command to download the latest signatures (got troubles? Try this troubleshooting guide) Mac Homebrew (or Linuxbrew) brew install richardlehane/digipres/siegfried (a fork of mistydemeo/digipres/siegfried)
